articles.author: Rod Nickel
articles.title: Drought shrivels Canada’s wheat crop to 14-year low, canola to 9-year low - Global News
articles.description: Canola importers may turn to Ukraine, western Europe and Australia for substitutes, one expert said.
articles.content:
Drought has shriveled Canada’s wheat crop to its smallest in 14 years, and its canola harvest to a nine-year low, a government report showed on Monday.
Parched soils and record-hot temperatures in C… [+1740 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Coronavirus booster shots 'not a luxury', WHO Europe head says - The Star Online
articles.description: COPENHAGEN (Reuters) -A third-dose booster shot of the COVID-19 vaccination is a way to keep the most vulnerable safe and "not a luxury", the World Health Organization said on Monday.
articles.content:
COPENHAGEN (Reuters) -A third-dose booster shot of the COVID-19 vaccination is a way to keep the most vulnerable safe and "not a luxury", the World Health Organization said on Monday.
